import React, { useContext } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import './ProductDisplay.css'; import { ShopContext } from '../../Context/ShopContext'; const ProductDisplay = () => { const { productId } = useParams(); // Get productId from URL const { all_product, addToCart } = useContext(ShopContext); // Check if all_product exists and is an array before trying to find the product if (!Array.isArray(all_product)) { return
Loading products...
; // Display loading if products are not yet available } // Find the product based on the productId from the URL const product = all_product.find((item) => item.id === Number(productId)); if (!product) { return
Product not found
; // Handle case where product is not found } return (

); }; export default ProductDisplay;
